growth_mechanism: Curiosity Gap, Binge-ability, High Search Volume
visual_plan: {"Hook": "Title promises a shocking reveal or must-know facts.", "Script": "Narrating a countdown of facts, products, or historical events.", "Visuals": "Slideshow of striking, relevant images/B-roll, energetic transitions."}
audio_notes: Energetic, driving music that builds tension.
example_applications: [{"example": "Top 10 Ancient Civilizations You Never Learned About.", "platform": "YouTube"}]

visual_plan: {"Text": "Large, clean, high-contrast text overlay of the quote.", "Script": "Inspiring 10-15 word quote or affirmation (AI Voice).", "Visuals": "Cinematic, high-quality stock footage (Pexels, Artgrid), slow-motion nature or cityscape."}
example_applications: [{"example": "A slow-motion clip of waves with a quote about perseverance.", "platform": "Instagram"}]

growth_mechanism: High Retention, Deep Niche Interest, Evergreen SEO
visual_plan: {"Hook": "Bold statement/question about the mystery/scandal.", "Script": "Deeply researched, narrative-driven script about a company/event/person.", "Visuals": "Archival photos, high-contrast animated charts/graphs, B-roll stock footage."}
audio_notes: Consistent, serious, and dramatic background score.
example_applications: [{"example": "A 10-minute video detailing the downfall of Blockbuster.", "platform": "YouTube"}]

visual_plan: {"VO": "Honest, detailed voiceover focusing on pros, cons, and comparison.", "Visuals": "Extreme macro and close-up shots of the product's features."}
audio_notes: Minimal, clean background music; focus on VO clarity.
example_applications: [{"example": "A 60-second review of a new noise-canceling headset focusing on earcup texture.", "platform": "Instagram Reels"}]

visual_plan: {"Text": "Simple text: The Process, The Result.", "Visuals": "A clear, static Before shot that quickly transitions to a high-quality After."}
audio_notes: Use a trending audio track where the beat drop coincides with the transition.
example_applications: [{"example": "A messy desk instantly changes to an organized, aesthetic workspace.", "platform": "Instagram Reels"}]

growth_mechanism: Novelty of AI Visuals, Simplification of Complex Topics
visual_plan: {"Pacing": "Very fast, new visual every 1-2 seconds.", "Script": "Clear, concise explanation of a tech/finance/science topic (AI Voice).", "Visuals": "AI-generated images or short clips, dynamic text animations, animated charts."}
example_applications: [{"example": "A 45-second explanation of quantum computing using AI-generated visuals.", "platform": "YouTube Shorts"}]

growth_mechanism: Satisfying Process, Practical Value, ASMR Element
visual_plan: {"Text": "Minimal text overlay for steps, or simple subtitles.", "Visuals": "Extreme close-ups, overhead shots of hands, time-lapses of the creation process."}
audio_notes: Hyper-focused ASMR sounds or upbeat, trendy music.
example_applications: [{"example": "A 30-second video making a miniature polymer clay item.", "platform": "TikTok"}]

visual_plan: {"Text": "Minimal text overlay only to name the product or brand.", "Visuals": "Close-up focus on the packaging, hands slowly unwrapping and handling the product."}
audio_notes: Focused ASMR sounds (paper rustling, box tapping, plastic peeling), zero voiceover.
example_applications: [{"example": "A 30-second video of unwrapping a new electronics product.", "platform": "YouTube Shorts"}]

visual_plan: {"VO": "Calm, instructional voice guiding the user step-by-step.", "Visuals": "High-quality, clean screen recording walkthrough."}
audio_notes: Clear, calm voiceover; minimal background music.
example_applications: [{"example": "A 5-minute tutorial on using advanced Notion database features.", "platform": "YouTube"}]

growth_mechanism: Urgent Value, Clear Takeaway, High CPM Niche
visual_plan: {"Script": "A quick tip or breakdown of a financial concept.", "Visuals": "Whiteboard animation style, animated graphs, screen recordings of relevant financial tools/websites."}
example_applications: [{"example": "A visual guide on how to maximize your ROTH IRA contributions.", "platform": "Instagram Reels"}]

visual_plan: {"Script": "Reading a popular story from a subreddit.", "Visuals": "Scrolling through the Reddit thread, animated text and moody stock photos to set the scene."}
example_applications: [{"example": "A 60-second clip reading the most dramatic part of a relationship story.", "platform": "TikTok"}]

visual_plan: {"Visuals": "Focus entirely on the pet. POV shots using a harness or close-ups of funny/cute behavior."}
audio_notes: Trending, often humorous sounds/music, or simple, non-verbal pet sounds.
example_applications: [{"example": "A POV video of a dog running through a park set to a trending sound.", "platform": "TikTok"}]

visual_plan: {"Pacing": "Short and punchy (under 15 seconds).", "Script": "A single, surprising fact about history, science, or a niche topic.", "Visuals": "Single, dramatic/high-quality image or short, looping B-roll."}
audio_notes: High-energy, short sound clip or trending audio.
example_applications: [{"example": "A 10-second fact card about the history of coffee.", "platform": "TikTok"}]

visual_plan: {"Text": "Curated quotes, actionable tips, or a short list of resources.", "Format": "Multi-slide image carousel.", "Visuals": "High-end, consistent aesthetic photos (minimalist, dark academia)."}
audio_notes: No sound required for carousel; minimalist music for accompanying Reel.
example_applications: [{"example": "A 10-slide carousel of minimalist office setups and related product links.", "platform": "Instagram"}]

growth_mechanism: High Watch Time (Passive Viewing), Anxiety Relief
visual_plan: {"Hook": "Simple, soothing title like Deep Focus: 8 Hours of Rain Sounds.", "Visuals": "High-resolution 4K looping scene (Rain, Lo-Fi Room, Snowy Cabin)."}
audio_notes: Binaural, high-quality audio track (rain, fireplace crackle, gentle Lo-Fi music).
example_applications: [{"example": "An 8-hour loop of a snowy cafe ambience with soft music.", "platform": "YouTube"}]
